title: Trance Channeling Demonic Possession Conspiracy Documentary xyz
description:
Trance Channeling Exposed as Demonic Possession (must watch)

 This should prove for some that channeling, going into a trance, will lead to demonic invocation. Now yoga, gazing into a mirror for long periods of time, Tai Chi, and other techniques are used for the same purpose. This video has testimonies from people that were going into a trance/mediation to invoke what they thought were spirit guides. Please download this because I know some of you have closed your mind to the subject. I feel like video is the best in telling the story of Channeling as demonic possession. Remember the movie Ghost? I just saw that movie on TV, the part where Whoopi Goldberg is a channeling and all these spirits enter her and take control of her. The movie is the promotion of the occult and demonic channeling. Download the torrent and see for yourself that these spirits are demonic. They are Satan's demons and the Bible exposes all of this. Jesus Christ is Lord!
